title: [Cattle breeding in UK]
brief_description: Showing off bulls of various cattle in UK. These animals are specifically bred to withstand extreme climatic conditions and to fend for themselves either in UK or other countries like South America. Breeds shown include: Herefords Devon, Aberdeen Angus and Shorthorns. The Shorthorns are bred for beef and milk. Short snippet of King George, Queen Elizabeth and the two princesses at a cattle show.
